description: [BADHATCH](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1081) can utilize Native API functions such as, `ToolHelp32` and `Rt1AdjustPrivilege` to enable `SeDebugPrivilege` on a compromised machine.(Citation: Gigamon BADHATCH Jul 2019)

external_references.description: Savelesky, K., et al. (2019, July 23). ABADBABE 8BADFOOD: Discovering BADHATCH and a Detailed Look at FIN8's Tooling. Retrieved September 8, 2021.
